name: germacra-1(10),4,11(13)-trien-12-oate,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (6alpha-hydroxylating)
definition: Germacrene A acid + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Costunolide + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
